amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill rules issued by the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meeks amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 243 (Roll no. 412).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Meeks amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 243 (Roll no. 412).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Meeks.
